issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The following test fails on Android in Rhino. 
"suite_name": "ui/ui",
"name": "deleteCorrectRowIndex",
"duration": 1128,
"result": "error",
"description": "<unable to get exception details>"

h3.NOTE ::
** Adding this test to list of known_failures.
** Once this ticket is resolved, make sure to remove the test case from list of known failures on Anvil Server.(If you have any problems with it, let me know.)
fields.summary: Android: Anvil fails for UI - `deleteCorrectRowIndex` test for Rhino
fields.environment:
Samsung Galaxy S II (android 2.3.6), 
Google Nexus 4 (4.2.1),
Motorola Droid2 2.2,
LG Optimus (OS v3.1)

comments.body: Closing ticket as the issue cannot be fixed.
